title: Bloomberg Markets: Fed Signals December Hike on Track
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Fed Signals December Hike on Track
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Jim Caron\u0010Portfolio Manager and Senior Member of Global Fixed Income Team\u0010Morgan Stanley Investment Management \u0010\u0010Eric Stein\u0010Portfolio Manager and Co-Director of Global Fixed Income\u0010Eaton Vance \u0010Discussing Federal Reserve officials voting unanimously to leave interest rates unchanged while signaling they remain on track to hike once more this year, a day before President Donald Trump plans to unveil his choice to lead the U.S. central bank.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
